remarks: An idempotent Hermitian operator generates a closed subspace.  Part of proof of Theorem of [AkhiezerGlazman] p. 64.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Apr-2006.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 19-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hmopidmch.1 $e |- T e. HrmOp $.
hmopidmch.2 $e |- ( T o. T ) = T $.
hmopidmchi $p |- ran T e. CH $.
